text: taman mata vætevi yayi ovun adahas karamin sitina se (sinayi) kanda ovunta ihalin mudun vahalayak men navata taba, (ovunta) “api obata laba dun (dharmaya) tadin alla ganu. ehi æti dæya (sæmavitama) avadhanayen yutuva tabanu. (emagin) oba parisuddhavantayin bavata pat viya hækiya” (yayi api ovunta pævasima nabiye!oba ovunta matak kara denu)
